name: Push-Up
description: A basic upper body strength exercise targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Squat
description: A fundamental lower body exercise targeting the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Burpee
description: A full-body cardio movement combining a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core strength exercise involving maintaining a position similar to a push-up.

name: Jump Rope
description: A high-intensity cardio exercise using a skipping rope.

name: Lunge
description: A lower body strength movement focusing on one leg at a time.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A full-body cardio move that also strengthens core and shoulders.

name: Pull-Up
description: An upper body exercise that primarily targets the back and biceps using body weight.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound movement lifting weight from the ground to hip level, working the posterior chain.

name: High Knees
description: A cardio drill that involves running in place while bringing knees up to waist height.

name: Bench Press
description: A chest-focused strength exercise performed lying on a bench with a barbell or dumbbells.

name: Sit-Up
description: A core-strengthening exercise that targets the abdominal muscles.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A basic full-body aerobic exercise performed by jumping to a position with legs spread and hands overhead.

name: Overhead Press
description: A shoulder strength movement where weights are pressed from shoulder to overhead.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the triceps using a chair or bench.

name: Rowing
description: A machine-based cardio workout that mimics the motion of rowing a boat.

name: Step-Up
description: A unilateral leg exercise performed by stepping onto a bench or platform.

name: Russian Twist
description: A rotational core exercise often performed with body weight or light weight.

name: Box Jump
description: A plyometric move that builds power and coordination by jumping onto a box or platform.

name: Calf Raise
description: An exercise targeting the calves by lifting the heels off the ground.
